text:
echo "executing autoexec.cfg ..."

//###########################################################################################
//                              CONNECTION
//###########################################################################################

cl_updaterate "128"
cl_cmdrate "128"
cl_interpolate "1"
cl_interp_ratio "1"
cl_interp "0"
cl_updatevisibility "1"
cl_lagcompensation "1"
cl_predict "1"
cl_predictweapons "1"
rate "786432"


//###########################################################################################
//                              MOUSE SETTINGS
//###########################################################################################

m_customaccel "0"
m_customaccel_exponent "1"
m_customaccel_max "0"
m_customaccel_scale "0"
m_forward "1"
m_mouseaccel1 "0"
m_mouseaccel2 "0"
m_mousespeed "0"
m_rawinput "1"


//###########################################################################################
//                              FPS improvements
//###########################################################################################

fps_max "999"
fps_max_menu "999"
muzzleflash_light "0"
r_drawtracers_firstperson "0"
r_dynamic "0"
r_eyegloss "0"
r_eyemove "0"
r_eyeshift_x "0"
r_eyeshift_y "0"
r_eyeshift_z "0"
r_eyesize "0"
mat_queue_mode "2"


//###########################################################################################
//                              VIEWMODEL SETTINGS
//###########################################################################################

cl_righthand 0
cl_viewmodel_shift_left_amt "0.500000"
cl_viewmodel_shift_right_amt "0.250000"
viewmodel_presetpos "0"
viewmodel_fov "68"
viewmodel_offset_x "2.5"
viewmodel_offset_y "2"
viewmodel_offset_z "-2"
cl_bob_lower_amt "5.000000"
cl_bobamt_lat "0.100000"
cl_bobamt_vert "0.100000"
cl_bobcycle "0.98"


//###########################################################################################
//                              CROSSHAIR
//###########################################################################################

cl_crosshairstyle "4"
cl_crosshairthickness "0.500000"
cl_crosshairsize "5.000000"
cl_crosshairgap "-2.000000"
cl_crosshairdot "0"
cl_crosshair_drawoutline "1"
cl_crosshair_outlinethickness "0.500000"
cl_crosshaircolor "1"
cl_crosshaircolor_b "0"
cl_crosshaircolor_g "255"
cl_crosshaircolor_r "0"
cl_crosshairalpha "255"
cl_crosshairusealpha "1"
cl_crosshairgap_useweaponvalue "0"
cl_crosshair_sniper_width "1"


//###########################################################################################
//                              GAME SETTINGS
//###########################################################################################

gameinstructor_enable "0"
cl_autohelp "0"
cl_showhelp "0"
cl_autowepswitch "0"
cl_disablefreezecam "1"
cl_loadout_colorweaponnames "0"	
cl_use_opens_buy_menu "0"
cl_rumblescale "0"
cl_forcepreload "1"
lobby_voice_chat_enabled "0"


//###########################################################################################
//                              HUD SETTINGS
//###########################################################################################

cl_hud_radar_scale "1.3"
cl_hud_background_alpha "0.4"
cl_hud_playercount_showcount "1"
cl_radar_icon_scale_min "0.7"
cl_show_clan_in_death_notice "0"
cl_radar_scale "0.40"
cl_radar_always_centered "0"


//###########################################################################################
//                              SOUND SETTINGS
//###########################################################################################

snd_mixahead "0.05"
engine_no_focus_sleep "0"
snd_headphone_pan_exponent "2"
snd_headphone_pan_radial_weight "0.5"
voice_mixer_volume "1"		


//###########################################################################################
//                              ALIASES AND BINDS
//###########################################################################################

// personal key binds
bind "c" "+voicerecord"
bind "\" "callvote"
bind "MOUSE3" "slot3"
bind "MOUSE4" "slot2"
bind "MOUSE5" "slot1"


//buy buids
bind "kp_end" "buy ak47; buy m4a1;"
bind "kp_leftarrow" "buy ump45;"
bind "kp_downarrow" "buy ssg08;"
bind "kp_5" "buy p250;"
bind "kp_rightarrow" "buy tec9; buy fiveseven;"
bind "kp_pgdn" "buy awp"
bind "uparrow" " buy vesthelm; buy vest;"
bind "downarrow" "buy defuser;"
bind "rightarrow" "buy hegrenade; buy smokegrenade; buy molotov; buy incgrenade; buy flashbang;"
bind "leftarrow" "buy deagle; buy revolver;"


//memes
alias "memes" "bind 6; bind 7; bind 8; bind 9;"
bind "6" "say #DESTINATIONFUCKED"
bind "7" "say bitch lasagna"
bind "8" "say ohh my goat"
bind "9" "say suck a sex"

// Display Damage with Switch Script
alias displaydamage "displaydamage_on"
alias displaydamage_on "con_filter_text Damage Given To; con_filter_text_out Player:; con_filter_enable 2; developer 1; playvol buttons\blip1 0.5; alias displaydamage "displaydamage_off""
alias displaydamage_off "con_filter_enable 0; developer 0; playvol buttons\blip2 0.5; alias displaydamage "displaydamage_on""
bind "F5" "displaydamage"


//jumpthrow
alias "+jumpthrow" "+jump; -attack"
alias "-jumpthrow" "-jump"
bind n "+jumpthrow"


//NET GRAPH on TAB
net_graph "0"
net_graphproportionalfont 0
alias "+scorenet" "+showscores; net_graph 1"
alias "-scorenet" "-showscores; net_graph 0"
bind "TAB" "+scorenet"

//Radar Scale
bind "kp_enter" "incrementvar cl_radar_scale 0.35 0.8 0.05"

//Toggle ingame Instructor
bind "h" "toggle gameinstructor_enable"

// cleanWalls
alias "cleanWalls" "r_cleardecals"
bind "alt" "cleanWalls"


//alias "clickSound" "snd_playsounds Buttons.snd14"

unbind "ENTER"
unbind "INS"
unbind "END"
unbind "PGUP"
unbind "PGDN"
unbind "ALT"
unbind "F3"
unbind "F4"
unbind "["
unbind "]"

host_writeconfig

echo "autoexec.cfg execution complete."
